reviews.review: Теперь мой лучший друг это лом...

Très bon jeu! Il est assez vieu mais les graphismes ne m'a pas "empéché" de jouer au jeu, je trouve que le jeu a bien vieilli (c'est que mon avis, je peut comprendre que les graphismes du jeu ne plaisent pas ^^).
Le gameplay est très bon, c'est à la 1ere personne (fps), le jeu démarre assez vite (et c'est vraiment cool).
Certaines phases dans le jeu sont assez long (surtout une en particulier) qui est assez ennuyeux je trouve, mais après cela le jeu retrouve de son dynamisme, la difficulté augmente progressivement bien.
je l'ai fini en 15h de jeu, ce que je trouve très bien.
Bon jeu a vous! ^^

Great gameplay, plot and locations. Once you get past the outdated graphics, it becomes a very enjoyable game.

Боевик, приключения и удостоенная наград технология создания потрясающе реалистичного мира, в котором игрок должен думать, чтобы выживать — всё это обладатель звания «Игра года» от более чем 50 изданий, дебютная игра от Valve — Half-Life. Помимо всего прочего в игре присутствует увлекательный многопользовательский режим, который позволяет играть против друзей и врагов со всего мира.
大名鼎鼎的《半条命》，一度改变了人们对FPS游戏的认知，好不夸张的说《半条命》改变了整个FPS游戏的发展，它向广大玩家们证明了：FPS游戏是可以拥有如同电影一般的剧情的。不过对于现在的玩家来说，游戏难度可能有些偏高，而且画质也是十分落后，所以现在的一些新玩家无法理解这款游戏的乐趣所在，这点可以理解，不过假如有正在挖掘老游戏的玩家的话，那就一定要玩玩这款游戏，这款“惊世神作”一定可以得到你的认可。
almost 20 years old (at the time of me writing the) yet the gameplay is still modern feeling.

Abartmiyorum zamanında eski pcde en az 50 65 kez tekrar tekrar bitirdigim bir oyundur ve her seferinde o heyecan ve mutluluk oluyor nasıl desen ne zaman nolcak biliyorsun ama genede oynuyorsun çok güzel oyun zamanında doomdan sonra gelip dünyayı kasıp kavuran bir kitleye sahip oldu yani bu oyun zaten ucuz ama kuruşu kuruşuna değer yani

Half-Life é um jogo muito bom que tu controla uma pessoa chamada Gordon Freeman que é um cientista de um lugar muito bom, ai tu vai num lugar onde tem uma coisa gigante cheio de raio, tu liga ela e tem que enfiar um carrinho lá (ñ sei pra q) ai tu enfia lá e buga tudo e abre um portal pra aqueles bichos, tu sai de lá , mata um monte de gente até matar o boss do game e zerar, o final do jogo ñ posso dizer mas é uma maravilha.

I didnt like it...

Before you get all annoyed let me explain. This game was amazing for its time, it was everything you could ever want in a first person shooter, but now its aged and its just not that great anymore, and to be fair, i only played it so i could move onto half life 2. theres moments where you just die for no reason whatsoever. and the amount of enimies can sometimes be overwhelming. I like games where they dont hold your hand the whole way, and this game did no hand holding at all (until the end (kinda)) and i ended up having to look up walkthroughs because i had to walk through a small crack in the wall to get to my objective. nonetheless, youd really enjoy it if youre up for a challenge, but im a more casual gamer and, was not into it.

Du genre classique, du genre "HISTORIQUE", car oui, ce jeu fait parti de ces éléments qui ont marquées l'histoire du vidéoludisme. Assez classe et propre pour l'époque, personnellement j'y ai joué quinze minutes, mais pour ceux qui ne connaissent rien aux Half-Life, partir de ce titre est un conseil.

Valve ont tenu le prix assez cher, car oui il date, mais cela reste un opus classique dans l'histoire du jeu vidéo, il est très recommendable.

This is(if not the best) one of the best sci-fi, rpg,old fps,campaing based games of all time.A huge successful game with fast paced online. The only negative thing is the price(10$),so you should better buy it at holidays or sales when the price gets only 1$. Nevertheless it's an enjoyable game 9.7/10.

Классика мира шутеров. Продвинутый сюжет, атмосфера, неплохой ИИ и классные звуковые эффекты (они прям как елей для моих ушей). Также игра имеет уникальное для своего времени Полу-Бесшовное построение уровней, создавая целостное восприятие игрового процесса. Локации очень большие и местами становится скучно, например уровни с монорельсом на ракетной базе. Мне игра нравится, но в своё время я отдал предпочтение Quake II. Моя оценка: 9 из 10. (2 прохождения)

8/10 from me

Pros:
-Brilliant level design throughout *most* of the game
-G O L D S R C M O V E M E N T 
-Good gunplay
-Cool storyline
-Neat industrial aesthetic that works well with the low-poly graphics
-Barney is secretly Kenny from South Park

Cons:
-Xen
-The weird lack of a reticle on the grenades, which makes taking out the artillery enemies way more difficult than it should be (Maybe I'm an idiot and missed something in the settings...)
-The worst ladders in any game ever. This may seem like a nitpick, but when you clip into a ladder and get stuck during a firefight, you'll know what I'm talking about
Benle beraber bir çok kişi bu oyunu korsan indirip oynamıştır.

很抱歉我不是老玩家，看到這麼多好評大部分都是小時候有玩過來回味的
但說實在的，這遊戲我真的玩得很痛苦
很多人都有的3D暈就不多說了 雖然調高FOV可以改善
但是它的操作手感真的很差 腳滑得跟什麼一樣
總是為了避免從梯子摔下去，在梯子邊前前後後對上老半天
這時候因為各種厭煩加畫面滑動，我就暈了真的很想吐
而且遊戲裡也不會給太多提示，像是要去哪個控制室開關，
利用機關殺大型怪物等。不看攻略會迷路很久
總之，對於新玩家，我個人是不推薦購買
想接觸這系列還是玩2吧
